db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:listitem.db:para: Switch is part of Buttons and Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description

db:figure.db:title: On and Off states of a Switch.

db:section.db:para: A Switch is a toggle button that can be switched on (checked) or off (unchecked). Switches are typically used to represent features in an application that can be enabled or disabled without affecting others.
On mobile platforms, switches are commonly used to enable or disable features.
You can create a custom appearance for a Switch by assigning a SwitchStyle.

db:section.db:title: activeFocusOnPress : bool
db:section.db:para: This property is true if the control takes the focus when it is pressed; forceActiveFocus() will be called on the control.

db:section.db:title: checked : bool
db:section.db:para: This property is true if the control is checked. The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: exclusiveGroup : ExclusiveGroup
db:section.db:para: This property stores the ExclusiveGroup that the control belongs to.

db:section.db:title: [read-only, since QtQuick.Controls 1.3] pressed : bool
db:section.db:para: This property is true when the control is pressed.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.3.

db:section.db:title: style : Component
db:section.db:para: The style Component for this control.

db:member.db:link: Qt Quick Controls Styles QML Types

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 1.3] clicked()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the control is clicked.
This signal was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.3.
